title: Part One: The Man Who Invented The Military-Industrial Complex
itunes:title: Part One: The Man Who Invented The Military-Industrial Complex
description:
Robert is joined by Alison Stevenson to discuss Alfred Krupp.

Footnotes:

  1. https://www.amazon.com/Torpedo-Inventing-Military-Industrial-Complex-Britain/dp/0674725263/?tag=saloncom08-20

  4. https://www.dw.com/en/the-krupp-dynasty-glorified-and-vilified/a-15867835 
  5. https://www.aa.com.tr/en/middle-east/ex-army-contractor-vows-to-overthrow-egypts-sisi/1647390 
  6. https://www.wired.com/2011/04/0426alfred-krupp-birthday-germany-cannon-king/ 
  7. https://salemcc.instructure.com/courses/451/pages/eyewitness-account-of-the-siege-of-paris-1870-71 
  8. https://www.amazon.com/Arms-Krupp-Industrial-Dynasty-Germany/dp/0316529400
